meanings.definition: Atenolols: a type of medication used to treat high blood pressure and chest pain.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed atenolols to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: The pharmacy ran out of atenolols, so I had to wait for the next shipment.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally mistook atenolols for candy and almost ate them!
meanings.sent4: Taking atenolols is like having a tiny superhero fighting high blood pressure in your body.
meanings.sent5: The atenolols worked like magic, making my chest pain disappear.

meanings.definition: Atenolols: the plural form of atenolol, a beta-blocker drug.
meanings.sent1: She takes two atenolols every morning to manage her heart condition.
meanings.sent2: The doctor recommended switching to atenolols for better heart health.
meanings.sent3: I keep forgetting to take my atenolols, and my heart is not happy about it!
meanings.sent4: His daily dose of atenolols is like a shield protecting his heart from harm.
meanings.sent5: The atenolols are like little soldiers fighting against heart problems in my body.
